name: NYDailyNews
text:
The Electoral Justice Project of the Movement for Black Lives is organizing the virtual convention, which is scheduled for Aug. 28.
https://t.co/lzGJSeS6CL

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The House approved a $1.5 trillion plan to fund transit projects. The bill also pumps billions into fixing roads, bridges and affordable housing. 

Republicans objected that the bill was really the Green New Deal in disguise.

https://t.co/XPvxk0eJMh

name: NYDailyNews
text:
San Francisco police will no longer release most mug shots to the public, due to fears that they undermine the presumption of innocence and contribute to racial stereotypes.

https://t.co/0pdMxb91Ut

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @snydenydn: Virgil Abloh’s initial rendition of Pop Smoke’s posthumous album cover was so bad, he took it off Instagram. 

Now, 50 Cent — who is in charge of Smoke’s album “Shoot for the Stars, Aim for the Moon” — is taking to the streets.
https://t.co/uLNXG8fWYB

name: NYDailyNews
text:
“Low-income people can’t afford cars."

Critics trashed Mayor de Blasio for cuts to half-price MetroCards for low-income residents. 

https://t.co/3cYtiNKMLr

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @snydenydn: Lizzo is on a health kick.
The plus-sized pop music sensation, 32, reveals she is vegan and introduces fans to her new diet on social media.
https://t.co/TopmFVqBCt

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The NFL will reduce its preseason schedule by two games due to the surge of coronavirus cases throughout the country, writes @FourVerts

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Armed gangs took to the streets of Ethiopia’s capital following the assassination of Haacaaluu Hundeessaa,  a popular singer and activist. At least 80 people were killed. 

https://t.co/6SUWIt9M0Y
